Package alien4cloud.webconfiguration

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CacheConfiguration  
    CacheFilter
    This filter is used in production, to put HTTP cache headers with a long (1 month) expiration time.
    JsonConfiguration
    Configuration for json mapping.
    MaintenanceFilter
    Filter that checks that maintenance mode is not enabled.
    MaintenanceFilterConfiguration  
    MetricsConfiguration  
    MetricsFilter
    Filter implementation which captures request information and a breakdown of the response codes being returned.
    RequestBodyOperationContextAdvice  
    RestDocumentationConfig  
    RestDocumentationHandlerProvider
    Request handler provider that also manages plugins apis.
    RestDocumentationPluginsBootstrapper
    Override rest documentation bootstrapper from swagger so we can load plugins and .
    StaticResourcesConfiguration  
    ToscaContextFilter
    Filter ensure the ToscaContext is empty at the beginning of each request and clean after
    ToscaContextFilterConfiguration  
    WebSocketConfiguration

    ToscaContextFilter.FixMeException
